root.name: Art Style: ORBIENT
root.description: Orbient is based on a bit generations game Japanese indie games put out by Nintendo on the GBA.The A button on the Wii remote produces gravity which pulls you towards planets while the B button produces anti-gravity that pushes you away. Absorbing smaller bodies makes you bigger while touching larger ones causes you to crash. The goal is to absorb the star at the end of each of the 36 levels. Art Style: Orbient costs 600 Wii points, and it is the first of the Art Style series of WiiWare games which includes Cubello and Rotohex.It was developed by skip ltd, creators of Chibi-Robo, Giftpia and Captain Rainbow.
